name: Idle High School Tycoon
description:
Have you ever wanted to run a school?

Get ready to manage the daily school lives of your students!
Witness their knowledge increase and exam scores improve as you upgrade your classes. Hire the best teachers to educate more efficiently and keep an eye on your students' wellbeing!
As your school grows, you will build more classrooms, teach different subjects, and admit more students. Your school will run even while you are not playing, so you will continue to earn cash even when offline!

IDLE HIGH SCHOOL TYCOON
- Become the Principal and run a high school!
- Manage your students as they ride the school bus, attend classes, and visit the Cafeteria!
- Profit from money investment to boost your reputation and become rich!
- Build up your idle millionaire empire simulation!
- Upgrade your school's equipment to increase your exam scores!
- Grow your fortune online or offline in this tycoon game!
